body:
cmake comes with ctest, which is used to run all tests created by cmake.   Using ctest provides more options than simply calling "make test".   I request that ctest be used in the test phase for packages built with cmake.  Note that both commands return status 0 if there are no tests to execute.  

 The main reason for this request is that ctest recognizes and uses the -jN option.  Unfortuntately, in the context of cmake, "make test -jN" simply runs the tests serially.
title: use ctest with cmake
